passage_text: required documents gather up proof of citizenship identification and a passport application renewals are easy an old passport serves as proof of citizenship and identification as long as it s in your current name was issued after you turned 16 is undamaged and less than 15 years old everyone else will have to prove citizenship and identification as a first time applicant

how long it takes it should take 3 weeks to get the passport use a different service if you need the passport urgently it can take longer if more information is needed or your application hasn t been filled out correctly don t book travel until you have a valid passport doing so is at your own risk

there have been times in the past when it could take up to 12 weeks or more to get a passport more recently the processing time has been 4 6 weeks for routine service when demand is low this can drop down to only 3 4 weeks expedited services usually takes 2 3 weeks although it can take longer the place you submit your request can determine how long it takes to get your travel document applications that are mailed in either directly or through a passport office can take up to 6 weeks for standard processing or up to 3 weeks if they are expedited

how much does it cost to get a passport a us passport book costs $ 100 usd for adults and is valid for ten years for children the passport costs less but is only valid for five years a us passport card costs $ 45 usd and is also valid for ten years for adults $ 35 usd for children and valid for five years a canadian passport costs $ 87 cad and is valid for five years here are some resources to help you find out how to apply for and

to get a passport you will need a document proving u s citizenship birth certificate expired passport certificate of citizenship or naturalization certificate if you have none of these documents you will need to provide a letter of no record to show that there is no official record for your birth
